mapper.sql: ACCOUNT_ID, ACCOUNT_CODE, HOST, PORT, TRY_TIMES, USER_NAME, PASSWORD, MARKET_ID, OBJECT_VERSION_NUMBER, REQUEST_ID, PROGRAM_ID, CREATION_DATE, CREATED_BY, LAST_UPDATED_BY, LAST_UPDATE_DATE, LAST_UPDATE_LOGIN, ATTRIBUTE_CATEGORY, ATTRIBUTE1, ATTRIBUTE2, ATTRIBUTE3, ATTRIBUTE4, ATTRIBUTE5, ATTRIBUTE6, ATTRIBUTE7, ATTRIBUTE8, ATTRIBUTE9, ATTRIBUTE10, ATTRIBUTE11, ATTRIBUTE12, ATTRIBUTE13, ATTRIBUTE14, ATTRIBUTE15, DESCRIPTION, ORGANIZATION, USE_WHITE_LIST
mapper.select:
select account.ACCOUNT_ID, account.ACCOUNT_CODE, account.HOST, account.PORT, account.TRY_TIMES, account.USER_NAME, account.PASSWORD, account.MARKET_ID, SPM_MARKET_B.name as MARKET_NAME, account.OBJECT_VERSION_NUMBER, account.REQUEST_ID, account.PROGRAM_ID, account.CREATION_DATE, account.CREATED_BY, account.LAST_UPDATED_BY, account.LAST_UPDATE_DATE, account.LAST_UPDATE_LOGIN, account.ATTRIBUTE_CATEGORY, account.ATTRIBUTE1, account.ATTRIBUTE2, account.ATTRIBUTE3, account.ATTRIBUTE4, account.ATTRIBUTE5, account.ATTRIBUTE6, account.ATTRIBUTE7, account.ATTRIBUTE8, account.ATTRIBUTE9, account.ATTRIBUTE10, account.ATTRIBUTE11, account.ATTRIBUTE12, account.ATTRIBUTE13, account.ATTRIBUTE14, account.ATTRIBUTE15, account.DESCRIPTION, account.ORGANIZATION, account.USE_WHITE_LIST from SYS_MESSAGE_SMS_ACCOUNT account left join SPM_MARKET_B on SPM_MARKET_B.MARKET_ID = account.MARKET_ID
and account.ACCOUNT_ID = #{accountId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}
mapper.insert:
select UNIX_TIMESTAMP()*1000+floor(rand()*1000) from dual
insert into SYS_MESSAGE_SMS_ACCOUNT (ACCOUNT_ID, ACCOUNT_CODE, HOST, PORT, TRY_TIMES, USER_NAME, PASSWORD, MARKET_ID, OBJECT_VERSION_NUMBER, REQUEST_ID, PROGRAM_ID, CREATION_DATE, CREATED_BY, LAST_UPDATED_BY, LAST_UPDATE_DATE, LAST_UPDATE_LOGIN, ATTRIBUTE_CATEGORY, ATTRIBUTE1, ATTRIBUTE2, ATTRIBUTE3, ATTRIBUTE4, ATTRIBUTE5, ATTRIBUTE6, ATTRIBUTE7, ATTRIBUTE8, ATTRIBUTE9, ATTRIBUTE10, ATTRIBUTE11, ATTRIBUTE12, ATTRIBUTE13, ATTRIBUTE14, ATTRIBUTE15, DESCRIPTION, ORGANIZATION, USE_WHITE_LIST) values (#{accountId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{accountCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{host,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{port,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{tryTimes,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{marketId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{objectVersionNumber,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{requestId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{programId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{creationDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{createdBy,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{lastUpdatedBy,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{lastUpdateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{lastUpdateLogin,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{attributeCategory,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{attribute1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{attribute2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{attribute3,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{attribute4,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{attribute5,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{attribute6,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{attribute7,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{attribute8,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{attribute9,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{attribute10,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{attribute11,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{attribute12,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{attribute13,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{attribute14,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{attribute15,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{organization,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{useWhiteList,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
